channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL MVP Odds, Race: Mahomes Favored; Allen Closing the Gap
item.description: A host of dominant quarterbacks are rearranging the MVP oddsboard. Here's the latest.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 Odds: Chiefs Remain Favored; Colts Make Leap
item.description: The Chiefs are the lone favorites, but a surprise AFC squad is climbing up the board. Here are the latest Super Bowl odds.

item.title: Blue Jays vs. Dodgers: 10 Unreal Facts From 18-Inning World Series Classic
item.description: Here are 10 facts from a historic, 18-inning Game 3 of the 2025 World Series between the Dodgers and the Blue Jays.

item.title: The Blue Jays Intentionally Walked Shohei Ohtani 4 Times, And They'll Do It Again
item.description: Shohei Ohtani is rightfully terrifying to the Blue Jays, and they will now take every possible precaution with his bat from here on out.

item.title: Red Sox Star Aroldis Chapman Would Rather 'Retire' Than Play for Yankees Again
item.description: Boston Red Sox star closer Aroldis Chapman said that he'd "retire" before pitching for the New York Yankees again.

item.title: Kelce has season-best performance in win over Commanders
item.description: Travis Kelce's historic night led the way for the Chiefs.

item.title: Who is left to pitch? What will Ohtani do next? Here's what to expect in World Series Game 4
item.description: Who is left to pitch? What will Ohtani do next? Here's what to expect as L.A. and Toronto return for an encore.

item.title: Dodgers win WS classic on Freeman's HR in 18th
item.description: Freddie Freeman once again lifted the Dodgers with a walk-off home run in a World Series, this time in the 18th inning of Game 3 against the Blue Jays...

item.title: Women's Bracketology: Ranking of No. 1 seeds shifts in final preseason edition
item.description: A key injury to South Carolina and other developments in the final weeks to tipoff shift projections.

item.title: Men's Bracketology: Houston tops No. 1 seeds in final preseason edition
item.description: Purdue, Florida and Duke round out the top line as tipoff to the 2025-26 season nears.
